entry.p: 1. Each M.2 connector Vss pad should be connected to its own Vss via. The distance between the edge of the pad and the edge of the via pad should be 255 um max.
2. Toe-side routing only for SMT connector.
PCIe Gen5 M.2 Spec compliant add-in card device.
Maximum via stub length for mainstream stackup
Reference plane for dual stripline route

Ground on both sides strongly preferred. If necessary, one side can be a power plane that has low amount of low frequency noise, but the other side must be continuous ground. Additional simulations might be required to quantify impact of dual referencing. Multiple split planes on reference layers is not recommended.
Must adhere to fiberweave related best routing practices (#406926).
